channel.title: CVE Feed for libtiff -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for libtiff -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2056|2024-08-03T00:24:44.219Z -- libtiff -- libtiff
item.description: Divide By Zero error in tiffcrop in libtiff 4.4.0 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit f3a5e010.

item.title: CVE-2022-1622|2024-08-03T00:10:03.771Z -- libtiff -- libtiff
item.description: LibTIFF master branch has an out-of-bounds read in LZWDecode in libtiff/tif_lzw.c:619, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit b4e79bfa.

item.title: CVE-2022-3627|2024-08-03T01:14:02.492Z -- libtiff -- libtiff
item.description: LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds write in _TIFFmemcpy in libtiff/tif_unix.c:346 when called from extractImageSection, tools/tiffcrop.c:6860, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit 236b7191.

item.title: CVE-2022-3599|2024-08-03T01:14:02.344Z -- libtiff -- libtiff
item.description: LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds read in writeSingleSection in tools/tiffcrop.c:7345, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit e8131125.

item.title: CVE-2022-3626|2024-08-03T01:14:03.243Z -- libtiff -- libtiff
item.description: LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds write in _TIFFmemset in libtiff/tif_unix.c:340 when called from processCropSelections, tools/tiffcrop.c:7619, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit 236b7191.

item.title: CVE-2022-2058|2024-08-03T00:24:44.171Z -- libtiff -- libtiff
item.description: Divide By Zero error in tiffcrop in libtiff 4.4.0 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit f3a5e010.

item.title: CVE-2022-3570|2024-08-03T01:14:02.491Z -- libtiff -- libtiff
item.description: Multiple heap buffer overflows in tiffcrop.c utility in libtiff library Version 4.4.0 allows attacker to trigger unsafe or out of bounds memory access via crafted TIFF image file which could result into application crash, potential information disclosure or any other context-dependent impact

item.title: CVE-2022-3598|2024-08-03T01:14:02.094Z -- libtiff -- libtiff
item.description: LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds write in extractContigSamplesShifted24bits in tools/tiffcrop.c:3604, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit cfbb883b.

item.title: CVE-2022-2953|2024-08-03T00:53:00.658Z -- libtiff -- libtiff
item.description: LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds read in extractImageSection in tools/tiffcrop.c:6905, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit 48d6ece8.

item.title: CVE-2022-1623|2024-08-03T00:10:03.766Z -- libtiff -- libtiff
item.description: LibTIFF master branch has an out-of-bounds read in LZWDecode in libtiff/tif_lzw.c:624, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit b4e79bfa.

item.description: Divide By Zero error in tiffcrop in libtiff 4.4.0 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit f3a5e010.

item.title: CVE-2022-4645|2024-08-03T01:48:39.676Z -- libtiff -- libtiff
item.description: LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds read in tiffcp in tools/tiffcp.c:948, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit e8131125.

item.title: CVE-2022-3597|2024-08-03T01:14:01.975Z -- libtiff -- libtiff
item.description: LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds write in _TIFFmemcpy in libtiff/tif_unix.c:346 when called from extractImageSection, tools/tiffcrop.c:6826, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit 236b7191.
